item.title: [508] Item Spawning in quest tab cost Money [508] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @MajorPro MajorPro
item.description:
@MajorPro wrote:

if (buttonId == 13) {//Dharoks if(p.InBounty == 1) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command in Bounty Hunter"); return; } if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } if(Engine.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, 5000000)){ Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 5000000); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4716, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4718, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4720, 1); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4722, 1); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You Spawn an Dharok's Set."); } else { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,"You do not have enough money!"); } break; }

I’ll start using this now, thanks.

item.title: [508] Item Spawning in quest tab cost Money [508] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“MajorPro, post:13, topic:428178”]if (buttonId == 13) {//Dharoks
if(p.InBounty == 1) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command in Bounty Hunter”);
return;
}
if (p.attackedBy != null) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command while in combat.”);
return;
}
if(Engine.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, 5000000)){
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 5000000);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4716, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4718, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4720, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4722, 1);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You Spawn an Dharok’s Set.”);
} else {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,“You do not have enough money!”);
}
break;
}

@Team_Rocket Is this what you meant for tags?[/quote]

No, this is what I meant.

item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

ok let me try by looking at your code…

if (buttonId == 36) {//Dharoks
if(p.InBounty == 1) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command in Bounty Hunter”);
return;
}
if (p.attackedBy != null) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You cannot use this command while in combat.”);
return;
}
if (p.jailed > 0) {
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You are jailed!”);
return;
}
Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(p, 995, 5000000);
} else if(p.playerItems.hasItem(p, 995, <= 4999999) [color=yellow]{[/color] //
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,“You do not have enough money!”);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4716, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4718, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4720, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 4722, 1);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “You Spawn an Dharok’s Set.”);
}
